questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc is where Luffy first demonstrates Gear Second and Gear Third while battling against CP9. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
questions.answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

questions.question: This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
